meanings.definition: The quality or state of being rimose.
meanings.sent1: The rimosity of the rock surface made it look like a honeycomb.
meanings.sent2: The rimosity of the pottery added an interesting texture to the piece.
meanings.sent3: The rimosity of the cheese made it easier to grate for the pizza.
meanings.sent4: The rimosity of the tree bark resembled intricate patterns of lace.
meanings.sent5: The rimosity of the coral reef created a beautiful underwater landscape.

meanings.definition: The act or process of becoming rimose.
meanings.sent1: Over time, the rimosity of the clay sculpture increased due to weathering.
meanings.sent2: The rimosity of the old wall was a result of years of erosion.
meanings.sent3: The rimosity of the ice cream cone increased as it melted in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The rimosity of the paper became more pronounced as it aged.
meanings.sent5: The rimosity of the mountain formed gradually over centuries.
